greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=1; for n > 1, a(n) = n^2 + Sum_{j=1..n-1} (-1)^j*a(j).
comment: 1 followed by interleaving of A004767 and A017653. - _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jan 04 2009
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,2,0,-1).
formula: a(n) = 2n-1 if n is 1 or an even number;
a(n) = 6n-7 if n is an odd number other than 1.
program: (MAGMA) S:=[ 1 ]; for n in [2..61] do Append(~S, n^2 + &+[ (-1)^j*S[j]: j in [1..n-1] ]); end for; S; // _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jan 04 2009
(Scheme) (define (A153285 n) (cond ((= 1 n) n) ((even? n) (+ n n -1)) (else (+ (* 6 n) -7)))) ;; _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 10 2017
xref: The second of a family of sequences that includes A153284 and A153286
results.author: _Walter Carlini_, Dec 23 2008
ext: Extended beyond a(30) by _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jan 04 2009
